sentences.en: 10,000 deaths a year from chronic lung disease are attributable to smoking.
sentences.cn: 吸烟导致每年有1万人死于慢性肺病。

sentences.en: About 4% of the prison population have chronic psychiatric illnesses.
sentences.cn: 大约4%的犯人有慢性精神疾病。

sentences.en: Chronic fatigue is also one of the salient features of depression.
sentences.cn: 慢性疲劳也是抑郁症的显著特点之一。

sentences.en: He was suffering from chronic bronchitis.
I developed serious arthritic symptoms and chronic sinusitis.
sentences.cn: 我得了严重的关节炎和慢性鼻窦炎。

sentences.en: If left untreated the condition may become chronic.
sentences.cn: 这种病如果不治疗可能会发展成慢性病。

sentences.en: Persistent damage or inadequate healing may lead to chronic lameness.
sentences.cn: 反复受伤或治疗不当可导致长期跛足。

sentences.en: The contributions employees pay give cover against sickness, including chronic invalidity.
sentences.cn: 员工的定期缴款用来支付生病的花费，包括长期病残的开销。
该国长期存在的失业问题

sentences.en: The illness frequently coexists with other chronic diseases.
sentences.cn: 这种病往往与其他慢性病同时存在。

sentences.en: There is no easy short-term solution to Britain's chronic economic malaise.
sentences.cn: 短期内迅速治愈英国经济顽症的灵丹妙药并不存在。

sentences.en: They think his mother's illness is acute rather than chronic.
sentences.cn: 他们认为他母亲的病是急性的,不是慢性的.

sentences.en: Those who suffer from narcissism become self-absorbed or chronic show-offs.
sentences.cn: 被自恋症折磨的人会变得只专注于自己的事情，或者不断地自我炫耀。
